SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

de.fu.weave.annotation
Annotation Type ModuleInfo

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
@Documented
public @interface ModuleInfo

Author:
Julian Fleischer

Required Element Summary
 String name
          The name of the Module.
 
Optional Element Summary
 String[] author
           
 String description
           
 String homepage
           
 String license
          Denotes the license under which the annotated Module is distributed.
 String menu
          The menuidentifier of the annotated Module.
 Requirement[] requires
          Requirements of this Module.
 String version
          The version of the annotated Module.
 

Element Detail

name

public abstract String name
The name of the Module.

The Module will be accessible via the name given here. Naturally this needs to be a unique identifier, therefore the Controller will throw an Exception when attempting to load a Module that defines a name twice. Typically the action will be located at //

Returns:
The name of the module.

author

public abstract String[] author
Returns:
The authors of the annotated Module as an Array of Strings.
Default:
""

description

public abstract String description
Returns:
The description of the annotated Module, or the empty string.
Default:
""

homepage

public abstract String homepage
Returns:
The homepage of the annotated Module, or the empty string.
Default:
""

license

public abstract String license
Denotes the license under which the annotated Module is distributed.

Returns:
The name of the license.
Default:
""

requires

public abstract Requirement[] requires
Requirements of this Module.

See Requirement.

Returns:
An array of Requirements (may be empty)
Default:
{}

version

public abstract String version
The version of the annotated Module.

The string may be anything, including the empty String.

Returns:
A string identifying this version.
Default:
""

menu

public abstract String menu
The menuidentifier of the annotated Module. Needed to reload the correct submenu

The string may be anything, including the empty String.

Returns:
A string identifying the menuposition.
Default:
""
